bioconda.name: bioconductor-rhtslib
bioconda.summary: HTSlib high-throughput sequencing library as an R package

biotools.summary: This package provides version 1.1 of the 'HTSlib' C library for high-throughput sequence analysis. It is primarily useful to developers of other R packages who wish to make use of HTSlib.

bioschemas.name: Rhtslib
bioschemas.summary: This package provides version 1.1 of the 'HTSlib' C library for high-throughput sequence analysis. It is primarily useful to developers of other R packages who wish to make use of HTSlib.
